long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Blade is an open source Design System. Link - https://github.com/razorpay/blade. It is a design system which will power future products of Razorpay and it can be used by everyone else as well. 

Using this chrome extension you can check how many DOM nodes are rendered via Blade Design system i.e coverage of Blade Design System on a web page.
